lead_paragraph: Carles Puyol, who scored in Spain’s 1-0 victory over Germany in the semifinals of the World Cup, has decided to keep playing for Spain for at least another two years.
snippet: Carles Puyol, who scored in Spain’s 1-0 victory over Germany in the semifinals of the World Cup, has decided to keep playing for Spain for at least another two years.

headline.main: Puyol to Keep Playing for Spain
headline.print_headline: Puyol To Keep Playing For Spain
